name: What Happened in the Well
description:
Why can't I just let it go?

Click text to progress, or use the arrows to move through the story.
NOTE: Characters are randomized (and you're not really supposed to know that normally) so a second playthrough is likely to be different!

Content Warnings

  • Structural Violence: A conflict between hierarchal powers occurs. The words "riot" and "uprising" are used.
  • Physical Violence, Injury, Death: Some brief descriptions of gore, injury, drowning, murder, death, and gun violence.
  • Swearing: "Motherfucker", "bitch" (in reference to a place only), "bastard", "fuck", and the more mild "damn", etc. are used.

References

If I looked at it and thought, "That's cool," while I made this, it's here.

  • In a Bamboo Grove (Ryuunosuke Akutagawa, tr. Jay Rubin)
  • Annihilation (Jeff VanderMeer)
  • rat chaos (winter lake)
  • the works of Emily Carroll
  • Mörk Borg
  • Pathologic fan comics by @elenaillustrate

Credits

If you can find it in the Well but I didn't make it, it's here.

  • Fungus
  • The Things They Carried (Tim O'Brien), excerpts from "How to Tell a True War Story"
